title: Employment Policies + Handbook Updates
description: A workflow for drafting and updating employment policies with a change log and review checklist.
checklist: List policies to update (harassment, leave, remote work, confidentiality)
Collect current policy text and annotate required changes
Draft updates and run internal review + stakeholder signoff
Record changes in a dated change log
risk_notes: Verify jurisdiction-specific requirements before finalizing policies.
Keep an audit trail for approvals and published versions.
